## rds-grid Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                                                                                                  | Type      | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `collapseGaps`    | `collapse-gaps`    | If true will remove padding/gaps within columns.                                                                                             | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `collapseMargins` | `collapse-margins` | If true will remove padding/gaps within columns.                                                                                             | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `itemsbase`       | `itemsbase`        | Adds the align-items: "items-base" style property for flex grids. All flex items are aligned such that their flex container baselines align. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `itemscenter`     | `itemscenter`      | Adds the "items-center" style property for flex grids. This will align flex items to the middle of the flex container.                       | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `justifybetween`  | `justifybetween`   | Adds the justify-content: "space-between" style property when type="flex". This adds space between each item in the flex box.                | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `justifyend`      | `justifyend`       | Adds the justify-content: "flex-end" style property when type="flex". This will pack flex items from the end or the right of the flex box.   | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `type`            | `type`             | Type is used to set the grid component to 'flex' or 'grid'                                                                                   | `string`  | `'grid'`    |


### Slots

| Slot | Description                                                          |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | Used to add grid cols or other elements/components as a grid column. |


----------------------------------------------
